desc: Examines theatrical activities, from theater's origins to 1700, from three interrelated perspectives 1) theater as social history, 2) theater as dramatic literature and 3) theater as performance; i.e. the result of creative decisions made by playwrights, actors, directors and designers. Prerequisite: Theatre 110. Offered Fall Semester of 2008-2009 and Fall Semester of 2010-2011.
name: Hist Theater-To 1700
title: History of Theater up to 1700
